file.fileData:
<#ftl output_format="HTML">
                <@compress single_line=true>
                query{
                    node(id: "${fulfillmentOrderId}") {
                        id
                        ... on
                        FulfillmentOrder {
                            id
                            status
                            updatedAt
                            fulfillAt
                            channelId
                            assignedLocation {
                                location {
                                    id
                                }
                            }
                            lineItems (first : 5) {
                                nodes {
                                    id
                                    sku
                                    variantTitle
                                    productTitle
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                </@compress>
